name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Slice beef into thin strips and season with salt and black pepper.
Heat butter in a skillet and sauté onions, garlic, and mushrooms until tender.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Pour in beef broth and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in sour cream and Dijon mustard, cooking until sauce is creamy.

name: Garlic Butter Roasted Chicken
instructions: Melt butter and mix with minced garlic, lemon juice, salt, black pepper, thyme, and rosemary.
Rub butter mixture over the chicken and place in a roasting pan.
Surround chicken with chopped carrots, potatoes, and onions.
Roast for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 165°F.
Let rest for 10 minutes before slicing and serving.

name: Classic Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot and sauté onions, garlic, carrots, and celery until softened.
Add chicken breast and pour in chicken broth.
Season with salt, black pepper, and thyme.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
Remove chicken, shred it, and return it to the pot.
Add egg noodles and cook until tender.
